resume_text:
NAME: Jack Blue
EMAIL: jack.blue@email.com
PHONE: (555) 345-6789

SUMMARY:
Cloud Architect with 12 years of experience in designing and implementing cloud solutions. Deep understanding of AWS, Azure, and GCP platforms.

SKILLS:
AWS, Azure, GCP, CloudFormation, Terraform, Kubernetes, Docker, Python

EXPERIENCE:
Cloud Architects Inc. - Principal Cloud Architect (2017 - Present)
- Led the design and implementation of cloud solutions for various clients.
- Developed and maintained cloud infrastructure using Terraform and CloudFormation.

Architect Solutions LLC - Senior Cloud Architect (2014 - 2017)
- Designed and implemented cloud solutions on AWS and Azure.
- Provided technical guidance and mentorship to junior architects.

IT Solutions Inc. - Cloud Architect (2012 - 2014)
- Migrated on-premise applications to the cloud.

EDUCATION:
York University - PhD in Computer Science (2012)

CERTIFICATIONS:
AWS Certified Solutions Architect - Professional
Microsoft Azure Solutions Architect Expert
Google Cloud Professional Cloud Architect
